title: Stream: A K U A – One’s Company EP
content:
My love for Canadian future-pop star A K U A grows by the day, and with the release of her fantastic debut EP, One’s Company, it’s likely that she’s not going to remain a secret for much longer.

Featuring the previously heard Gravity, Push and Told You So, alongside new cuts Monster and One’s Company, it’s an intoxicating listen, fusing choppy beats with her utterly unique vocals. What’s most impressive about A K U A above all, is just how fresh she sounds, whilst drawing from early 00’s pop inspirations, and mid 80’s R&B, it remains a distinctive and modern approach. Check out the EP in full below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
